answerText: Republic of India [or Bharat] [10]  Ashoke Ganguli names his son after this Russian author, who he was reading when the train derailed, wondering at the strange name of Akaky Akakyevich in his story "The Overcoat."
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 5 | 2 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Jhumpa Lahiri's novel The Namesake is about a man with an unconventional name.  [10] In The Namesake, the protagonist's father rides a train that derails in Calcutta in this country, Lahiri's birthplace.
